00117 class WXXMLDLLEXPORT wxXml2HelpWrapper : public wxObject
00118 {
00119         DECLARE_ABSTRACT_CLASS(wxXml2HelpWrapper)
00120 
00121         
00122         bool m_bLinked;
00123 
00124 protected:
00125 
00127         virtual void Destroy() = 0;
00128 
00130         virtual void DestroyIfUnlinked();
00131 
00134         void Link(bool linking = TRUE)
00135                 { wxASSERT_MSG(m_bLinked != linking || linking == FALSE, 
00136                   wxT("Cannot link this node another time; already linked !!")); 
00137                   m_bLinked = linking; }
00138 
00139 public:
00140         wxXml2HelpWrapper() { m_bLinked=FALSE; }
00141         virtual ~wxXml2HelpWrapper() {}
00142 };

00164 class WXXMLDLLEXPORT wxXml2ElemContent : public wxXml2HelpWrapper
00165 {
00166         friend class wxXml2ElemDecl;
00167         DECLARE_DYNAMIC_CLASS(wxXml2ElemContent)
00168 
00169         
00170         xmlElementContent *m_cont;
00171 
00172 protected:
00173 
00174         void Destroy() {
00175                 if (m_cont) xmlFreeElementContent(m_cont);
00176                 SetAsEmpty();
00177         }
00178 
00179         void SetAsEmpty()
00180                 { m_cont = NULL; }
00181 
00182         void Copy(const wxXml2ElemContent &n)
00183                 { m_cont = xmlCopyElementContent(n.m_cont); }
00184 
00185 
00186 public:
00187 
00188         wxXml2ElemContent(xmlElementContent *cont = NULL) 
00189                 : m_cont(cont) {}
00190 
00191         wxXml2ElemContent(const wxString &name, 
00192                                         wxXml2ElementContentType val = wxXML_ELEMENT_CONTENT_PCDATA,
00193                                         wxXml2ElementContentOccur occ = wxXML_ELEMENT_CONTENT_ONCE)
00194                 { m_cont=NULL; Create(name, val, occ); }
00195 
00196         virtual ~wxXml2ElemContent() { DestroyIfUnlinked(); }
00197 
00198 
00199 public:         // operators
00200         
00201         bool operator==(const wxXml2ElemContent &decl) const;
00202         bool operator!=(const wxXml2ElemContent &decl) const    { return !(*this == decl); }
00203 
00204         wxXml2ElemContent &operator=(const wxXml2ElemContent &decl)
00205                 { Copy(decl); return *this; }
00206 
00207 
00208 public:         // miscellaneous
00209 
00210         void Create(const wxString &name, 
00211                         wxXml2ElementContentType val,
00212                         wxXml2ElementContentOccur occ);
00213 
00214         bool IsNonEmpty() const
00215                 { return m_cont != NULL; }
00216 
00217         xmlElementContent *GetObj() const
00218                 { return m_cont; }
00219 
00220         wxXml2ElementContentType GetType() const
00221                 { return (wxXml2ElementContentType)GetObj()->type; }
00222         wxXml2ElementContentOccur GetOccurrence() const
00223                 { return (wxXml2ElementContentOccur)GetObj()->ocur; }
00224 
00225         wxString GetName() const
00226                 { if (GetObj()) return XML2WX(GetObj()->name); return wxEmptyString; }
00227         wxXml2Namespace GetNamespace() const
00228                 { if (GetObj()) return wxXml2Namespace(XML2WX(GetObj()->prefix), wxEmptyString); return wxXml2EmptyNamespace; }
00229 
00230         wxXml2ElemContent GetFirstChild() const
00231                 { if (GetObj()) return wxXml2ElemContent(GetObj()->c1); return wxXml2EmptyElemContent; }
00232         wxXml2ElemContent GetSecondChild() const
00233                 { if (GetObj()) return wxXml2ElemContent(GetObj()->c2); return wxXml2EmptyElemContent; }
00234         wxXml2ElemContent GetParent() const
00235                 { if (GetObj()) return wxXml2ElemContent(GetObj()->parent); return wxXml2EmptyElemContent; }
00236 };

00580 class WXXMLDLLEXPORT wxXml2DTD : public wxXml2Wrapper
00581 {
00582         DECLARE_DYNAMIC_CLASS(wxXml2DTD)
00583 
00584         
00585         xmlDtd *m_dtd;
00586 
00587 protected:
00588 
00589         void Destroy() {
00590                 if (m_dtd) xmlFreeDtd(m_dtd);
00591                 SetAsEmpty();
00592         }
00593 
00594         void SetAsEmpty()
00595                 { m_dtd = NULL; }
00596 
00597         void Copy(const wxXml2DTD &dtd) {
00598                 UnwrappingOld();
00599                 m_dtd = dtd.m_dtd;
00600                 JustWrappedNew();
00601         }
00602 
00603         int &GetPrivate() const
00604                 { return (int &)(m_dtd->_private); }
00605 
00611         void SetRoot(wxXml2BaseNode &node);
00612 
00613 public:
00614 
00616         wxXml2DTD() : m_dtd(NULL) {}
00617 
00620         wxXml2DTD(const wxString &file) : m_dtd(NULL) 
00621                 { Load(file); }
00622 
00624     wxXml2DTD(const wxXml2Document &doc,
00625                                 const wxString &name, const wxString &externalid,
00626                                 const wxString &systemid) : m_dtd(NULL) 
00627                 { Create(doc, name, externalid, systemid); }
00628 
00630         wxXml2DTD(xmlDtd *dtd) : m_dtd(dtd)
00631                 { JustWrappedNew(); }
00632 
00634         wxXml2DTD(const wxXml2DTD &dtd) : m_dtd(NULL)
00635                 { Copy(dtd); }
00636 
00639     virtual ~wxXml2DTD() { DestroyIfUnlinked(); }
00640

00655                                 const wxString &systemid);

00679 public:         // checkers
00680 
00682         bool IsOk() const;
00683 
00685         bool IsNonEmpty() const
00686                 { return m_dtd != NULL; }
00687 
00690         bool IsUnlinked() const
00691                 { if (!m_dtd) return TRUE; return (m_dtd->parent == NULL); }
00692 
00697         bool IsExternalReference() const;
00698 
00706         bool IsSystemSubset() const;
00707 
00716         bool IsPublicSubset() const;
00717 
00726         bool IsFullDTD() const
00727                 { return !IsExternalReference(); }

00735                 { if (IsPublicSubset()) return XML2WX(m_dtd->ExternalID); return wxEmptyString; }
00736

00743                 { if (IsPublicSubset()) return XML2WX(m_dtd->SystemID); return wxEmptyString; }

00750

00773                 { SetSystemID(u); }
